name: Hell Mall
description:
This is a demo of the game we are working on. This is not a full release or even an early access. We're putting this demo out to get some feedback on our combat system.

Beat your foes and save your souls! Callaghan and his friends have been trapped in an infinite HELLMALL; some tech company's perverse vision of Heaven. There are those who'd stop you from getting out, so buy and equip items, upgrade them and swap out abilities to build your party to survive the onslaught! In this turn-based roguelike RPG you will have to rely on your strategy skills, improvisation and a little bit of daring.

  • Dynamic character switching combat:
  • Choose the right party character for the job.
  • Use equipment to modify your team.
  • Swap out abilities!
  • People to meet and things to do:
  • Every run through the mall is unique, but the characters you encounter will remember you. Develop your relationships with the other doomed souls lurking in Cloud9 for new party characters. Complete unique side quests to know your friends better!
  • Collect and complete your sticker book.
  • Secrets to find and new mysteries to uncover.
  • Gain currency after every run to acquire new resources, questlines and character traits that can appear in your next run!
